alert.note: Alert for Northern Clearwater Mountains; Orofino, Grangeville Region; Southern Clearwater Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 7:11PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of north central Idaho and south central Clearwater Counties through 645 PM PDT... At 611 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Weippe to 11 miles north of Lowell. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pierce, Weippe, Musselshell, and Jaype. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Northern Clearwater Mountains; Orofino, Grangeville Region; Southern Clearwater Mountains
